meanings.definition: The quality or state of being snooty.
meanings.sent1: Her snootiness was evident in the way she looked down on others.
meanings.sent2: I don't appreciate the snootiness of some people who think they are better than everyone else.
meanings.sent3: Despite her snootiness, she couldn't resist laughing at the silly joke.
meanings.sent4: The snootiness of the fashion elite was like a thick fog, obscuring the beauty in simplicity.
meanings.sent5: The snootiness of the queen bee made her unpopular among the other bees.

meanings.definition: Behavior or attitude characterized by arrogance or condescension.
meanings.sent1: His snootiness towards the new employees created a tense atmosphere in the office.
meanings.sent2: The snootiness of the celebrity made it difficult for fans to approach him.
meanings.sent3: Despite his snootiness, he couldn't resist helping the lost puppy find its way home.
meanings.sent4: The snootiness of the rich businessman was like a heavy cloak, isolating him from genuine connections.
meanings.sent5: The snootiness of the judge made the courtroom feel intimidating and unwelcoming.
